ygData.subject: Re: Where EQ wanna go tomorrow?
ygData.msgSnippet: one thing, there no way to riase the faction with this npc dwarf as at moment :p think twice if u wanna travel to oot via butcher to get roo :p ... Lim Choong
ygData.messageBody:
one thing, there no way to riase the faction with
this npc dwarf as at moment :p
think twice if u wanna travel to oot via butcher to get
roo :p


At 03:22 PM 9/23/99 +0800, you wrote:
>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
>Finally I found some very good spots to hunt and lvling again, killing
>guards. No, not killing evil guards, their spawns sux like hell.
> Wandering Nek forest one of the nights with FF, Fes and Feb, only whimpy
>guards, no dragoons.
>
>Today I read tat at lvl 30-35, it's best to kill good guards, LOL. See
>those dwarf npc merchant in Buthcerblock? KILL THEM! See the fisherman in
>the port? KILL THEM!!! They dropped 2H axe tat can be sold for 22pp.
> Pple just need to hunt 10 days and they get 10,000pp! Talk abt faction,
>who care? Verant make it such that killing these npcs will not affect
>faction of similar race npc in elsewhere (eg u kill dawrf at dock but wont
>get KOS in dwarf city).
>
>One of the main attractions tat EQ used to attract me is alighnment policy,
>just like my good old D&D games. Now the faction thingy is so broken that
>we have to follow everyone to kill good races npc. Sigh, at least killing
>innocent npc in UO DOES give a REAL faction (so call karma and title hit)
>hit.
>
>What? U insist not to follow the rest to kill good races npc? Ah, then get
>prepared to kena KS by those powerlvl gamers...Where else can casters solo
>hunting and lvling? Yes...those 1-3 mob camps...now ya choice widen with
>solo guards hunting. Yes, Verant think Yield Rule will fail (I'm one of
>those who say I WILL NOT YIELD! BAN ME MF!!!)..so they make more guards
>for all to kill/lvl.
>
>What? Not enuff guards to kill? Try gnome guards, EK guards, Qeynos guard
>or even Halas guard if you dun wanan enter tat cold freezing city..hehe.
>
>Maybe when Ziltus reach lvl 50, it's time to leave EQ... ;P
>
>And no, after UO and EQ, I will TRY not to touch any long-term online RPG.
> I guess I will only try those session RPG like Winternight (Baldur's Gate
>interface, AD&D rules) and Diablo 2 (Diablo kick ass, I have faith in
>Diablo 2). Sometime I wonder, how to cope up with more than 1 online RPG
>like UO and EQ? Sad to say when EQ server down these 2 weeks, I login UO
>and find UO really DOES have more role-playing elements than EQ. At least
>when I dun feel like sticking my backside on the treant hill for 5 hrs in a
>row, I dun have to do the same in UO. I login my miner and mine some ores,
>make some tinkering items (jeeze I havent make any of the cool new
>tinkering stuffs since the patch) and branded weap (my craftman is GM smith
>& tinker)...and I spend 20 min or so to make some furniture to redecorate
>the rooms I used to trap polar bear for sparring (all deleted by GM, my
>craftman also master lumberjack and carpenter)...boy I start to miss UO
>after 4 mths of playing EQ, hehe....
>
>Talk abt AC, I really very scare to go in...hehe.
>
>Ziltus
>
>>Singapore Everquest Players List
